summary:
A successful, highly motivated and results focused professional, with extensive, senior management experience in Business Change/Transformation & Programme Management and Procurement/Supply Chain Management within multinational organizations, covering numerous industry sectors i.e. Telecommunications, Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Governmental Bodies and Management Consulting. 

An inspirational, hands-on leader, able to translate organisational strategies/vision into realistic, tangible action plans, challenging and energising organisations to achieve exceptional performance.  

An excellent manager, who deals particularly well with change and turbulent times; able to skilfully navigate and coach teams through such periods of uncertainty.

High personal integrity; able to relate to and gain the respect, trust and confidence of all. 

Established his own business in January 2016, providing Interim Management Services and Consultancy Support, following a long and very successful career with Vodafone Group PLC, PricewaterhouseCoopers and numerous enterprises within the Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing Industry.

education.field_of_study: International Master in Strategic Purchasing and Supply Chain Management

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
Ooredoo Qatar, a US$ 9bn. Telco Operator with interests in Middle East, Africa and South East Asia..
•	Designed the solution and provided the associated business case for a Supplier Relationship Management capability to be rolled out across Ooredoo’s footprint (10+ markets)..
•	Delivered the initial feasibility study plus business case for a centralized software procurement entity..
Achievements
	Delivered and received Senior Executive level approval for implementation of both initiatives..
profile_positions.title: Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	Developing and implementing a post signature, Commercial Contract Management capability across Vodafone’s 20+ markets via a major organisational transformation programme; intended to mitigate contractual risks and ensure minimal value leakage in Vodafone’s relationship with its suppliers.
•	Building a Commercial Contract Management “Centre of Excellence” and implementing organisational change, governance, processes, tools and automation across the 20+ markets
•	Affecting the roles and responsibilities of circa 150 employees worldwide, covering €5bn+ of spend across 50+ suppliers
Achievements
	Delivered and received Senior Executive level approval for a Commercial Contract Management “Blueprint” and associated Business Case, to be implemented in all Vodafone local markets. 
	Set-up a Commercial Contract Management “Centre of Excellence”
	Conducted “‘as is” to “to be” analysis across all Vodafone markets
	Implemented the Commercial Contract Management “Blueprint” principles across all Vodafone markets
	Tracked the delivery of the Commercial Contract Management Business Case benefits
	Compiled the detailed requirements for the “future state” Commercial Contract Management automation tools; led the RFP and vendor selection process, thereafter
profile_positions.title: Programme Director Supply Chain Commercial Contract Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading the SCM IT-Infrastructure team of 10 employees, covering €600m+ spend/annum
•	Central, global procurement on-behalf of Vodafone’s 20+ markets Sourcing of IT servers, storage, office IT, cloud, retail and security categories
•	Supplier portfolio consisting of the major IT companies, including HP, IBM, Oracle, Microsoft, EMC, VmWare, etc.
Achievements
	Led the IT Infrastructure Category, providing Category & Sourcing Strategies and the execution, thereof 
	15%+ year-on-year savings, with a cumulative value of circa € 1bn, over an  8 year period
	Extended the team’s portfolio in terms of markets (partners, 3rd parties) and services, i.e. cloud, retail, security.
profile_positions.title: Category Director Supply Chain IT-Infrastructure

profile_positions.description:
•	Business lead for the Distribution/Sales change programme, transforming a SOHO/SME Retail Sales Chanel (100+ FTE) into other organisational entities, as part of a new, overall Distribution Strategy
•	Business lead for the Billing transformation programme (Aurora), a tri-partite programme with Vodafone UK, Vodafone Ireland and Vodafone Netherlands, to gain synergies by implementing a common “out of the box”’ Billing solution;  programme team of 50+ employees  
•	Programme Manager Sarbanes Oxley (SOX) responsible for managing Vodafone Netherlands’ full compliance with Section 404 of the Sarbanes Oxley Act 
Achievements
	Successful execution of the Distribution Strategy, organisational transformation delivered and personnel re-allocated to new roles  
	Led the Billing transformation Programme towards a final go/no-go decision, with termination and dismantling of the change programme structure, as a result
	Successful implementation of the SOX controls and compliance with Section 404 of the Sarbanes Oxley Act.
profile_positions.title: Director Business Change & Projects

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the integration and management of various Procurement entities into a central Procurement Team (30+ FTE); annual turnover €500m+
•	Contract negotiations, including those for the  UMTS (Universal Mobile Telecommunications System) 
•	Implementation of an E-procurement environment
•	Lead and represent Vodafone’s smaller countries, within Vodafone’s global SCM synergy programmes 
Achievements
	Successful harmonisation and integration of the different Procurement teams into one centralised SCM unit
	Led the SCM organisation (30+ FTE), providing Category & Sourcing Strategies and the execution, thereof
	15%+ year-on-year savings, with a cumulative value of circa €½bn,  over a 4 year period
	Successfully managed the interests of the smaller Vodafone markets in Vodafone’s global SCM synergy programmes
profile_positions.title: Director of Procurement / Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
•	Introduction of the Business Excellence Programme according to the principles of the European Foundation for Quality Management (EFQM)
•	Process improvement, Policy deployment, Balanced Scorecard, Customer & Employee Surveys, Corporate Responsibility, etc.
•	Senior Assessor for EFQM programmes in Italy, Spain & Russia
Achievements
	Delivered and implemented the key drivers of the EFQM Business Excellence model;  initiated an maintained a sustainable business improvement culture 
	Successfully participated as a senior assessor in EFQM’s Award Assessments around the Globe.
profile_positions.title: Manager Business Improvement

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead a team of management consultants (10+FTE) developing a tool for and execution of Company Assessments, covering elements such as Policy & Strategy, Marketing & Sales, Research & Development, Procurement & Logistics, Quality Management & Production Improvement, Finance & IT and Human Resources in SME’s
•	Numerous assignments in Dutch Industry (various industries) and for Dutch Governmental Bodies (Ministry of Defense & Ministry of Economic Affairs) 
•	Evaluate the effectiveness and efficiency of Governmental Industry Stimulation Programmes, such as Quality & Logistics, Micro Electronics in the Netherlands, Technical Development Loan, etc.
Achievements
	Successfully led and executed an assessment of 50+ SME’s in various branches, providing advice on how to improve their performance in terms of Strategy, Innovation and Operational Excellence. Successfully supported the majority of these implementations
	Successful delivery of evaluation reports and recommendations to Dutch Governmental bodies regarding their stimulation programmes
	Successfully advised and supported multiple organisations in various branches (Electrical Engineering, Environment, Agricultural Industry) with development and implementation of their Strategies, Innovation plans and Operational Excellence programmes
	Successfully advised Dutch Industries in their application for Governmental Innovation subsidies (Technical Development Loan).
profile_positions.title: Senior Management Consultant

company.name: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing Industry - NKF Cable Company; Rietschoten & Houwens; Van Swaay

profile_positions.company: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing Industry - NKF Cable Company; Rietschoten & Houwens; Van Swaay
profile_positions.description:
•	Several Executive positions at NKF Cable Company, amongst which, responsibility for final Test & Inspection, Logistics (Warehouse, Expediting), Internal Transportation, 60+ FTE
•	Executive Manager to the High Tension Cable Accessories Design Group at NKF Cable Company, 15+ FTE’s
•	Responsible for the foundation and implementation of a Quality System in compliance with the Allied Quality Assurance Publication AQAP 1 standard, covering work for the Dutch Royal Navy, field work at RDM, Submarines Walrus Class; Wilton Feijnoord, Submarines Sea Dragon Class, Standard Frigates; Koninklijke Maatschappij De Schelde, Standard Frigates; Van der Giessen de Noord, Minesweepers
•	Responsible for the design and commissioning of HVAC (Heating Ventilation, Air Conditioning & Cooling) systems; Projects included: Office Building Europoint, Roterdam; Shopping Mall Babylon, The Hague; National Airport Schiphol, Amsterdam   
Achievements
	Implemented Computer Aided Design automated solution for accessory design
	Enterprise wide Quality Assurance capability acc. AQAP 1 implemented, certified & maintained
	Successfully led the integration of Testing & Inspection, Logistics, Warehouse & Transportation units into one central entity.
profile_positions.title: Executive Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Quality Representative on-behalf of the Netherlands Ministry of Defence at suppliers’ factories, for products and services with military applications, including Philips Telecommunication Industries (PTI), Verolme Elektra, Elekluft Bonn (NATO supplies)
Achievements
	Successful supported and assessed MOD suppliers with implementation of their Quality Assurance Programmes.
profile_positions.title: Quality Representative
